iris noun [C]
(FLOWER)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a tall plant with large, colorful, often yellow or purple flowers and long pointed leaves
iris noun [C]
(EYE)
the colored, circular part of an eye surrounding the black pupil (= central part): When you say someone is blue-eyed, you are referring to the color of their irises.
